channel.title: Npc drops?
channel.description:
:confused: Alright bro im so rusty in coding nowa days. i just need someone to tell me why everytime i edit npc drops the npcs dont drop it.... this is what i put in npc drops file..
[code]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 2745 0 1546 1 [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]
[/code]
and then i save compile and run.. when i kill jad it wont work... he only drops what he wants.. someone tell me why?

item.title: Npc drops?
item.dc:creator: @abdullahown abdullahown
item.description:
@abdullahown wrote:

npcdrops.cfg dont work
use npchandler.java, like this
search
public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)
and scroll down past the
} else {
you should see something like this, hint use this as your layout
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == XXX){
ItemHandler.addItem(ITEMID, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, AMOUNT, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
you can always/obviously add more then one
post again on THIS topic if you want me to explain how to get a rando

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drops?
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:3, topic:178795”]npcdrops.cfg dont work
use npchandler.java, like this
search
public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)
and scroll down past the
} else {
you should see something like this, hint use this as your layout
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == XXX){
ItemHandler.addItem(ITEMID, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, AMOUNT, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
you can always/obviously add more then one
post again on THIS topic if you want me to explain how to get a random drop[/quote]

omg… wtf is this bs… im possitive someone knows a better way… besides i just tried looking for wut u said and its not even in my npchandler.java

Read full topic
